original_text: Job, you must not continue to turn against God. That is the way that evil people lived long ago. Job, you must not continue to turn against God. That is the way that evil people lived long ago. Job, you must not continue to turn against God. That is the way that evil people lived long ago. Job, you must not continue to turn against God.
korean_text: 네가 악인이 밟던 옛적 길을 지키려느냐

sentences.original_text: Job, you must not continue to turn against God.
sentences.korean_translation: 욥이여, 계속해서 하나님을 대적해서는 안 됩니다.
